ygData.subject: Re: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t say what will happen if I give him all the ingredients at once because both times I did it separately and it worked fine. I never tried the alliance
ygData.messageBody:
I can't say what will happen if I give him all the ingredients at once because
both times I did it separately and it worked fine.

I never tried the alliance spell when the Ogre was in there, he killed me
twice. :( I did notice however the ogre leaves at night (game time) and a dark
elf and a dwarf show up in his place. They were indifferent to me, so I
completed that part of the quest when they were in there.

Ezrae


Rich Hitz wrote:

> From: Rich Hitz <Rich.Hitz@...>
>
> <snip>
> I forgot to mention that the web page doesn't mention that 2 of the
> components (the Koalindl fish and the Eruds Tonic) required to complete the
> first half of the quest (make the bartenders compendum) are no drop, as is
> the compendum.
> <snip>
>
> A fellow guild member also told me to turn in the items to the Freeport
> Bartender one at a time as giving all 4 at once sometimes doesn't result in
> anything. I also was given conflicting advice that if you cast Alliance on
> him from the "patron" side of the bar that the Ogre will(not) attack you.
>
> Can anyone confirm/ deny either of these?
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Bahir
>
>
